Posts.Content: Was with Oncologist today for check up.  Had double lumpectomy plus radiotjeraphy last year.   Advised consultant that despite length of time since surgery, energy levels have not returned and experiencing pain and discomfort in right breast (which was so sore when he examined).   He tested glands, abdomen etc., etc.,  and says he wants several blood tests done and appt with radiographer.  Just womdering if anyone has experienced anything similar?
Posts.Title: Appt with radiographer
